name: 伊雷娜·约里奥-居里
bio_short: 法国物理学家和化学家，玛丽·居里（Marie Curie）的女儿。她与丈夫弗雷德里克·约里奥-居里（Frédéric Joliot-Curie）共同发现了“人工放射性”（`joliot_curie_artificial_radioactivity_1934`），并因此获得了1935年的诺贝尔化学奖。
bio_short_en: A French physicist and chemist, the daughter of Marie Curie. She and her husband, Frédéric Joliot-Curie, jointly discovered 'artificial radioactivity' (`joliot_curie_artificial_radioactivity_1934`), for which they won the 1935 Nobel Prize in Chemistry.
